title: Halálos Iramban
details: Halálos Iramban (The Fast and the Furious) is an action-packed film series that focuses on illegal street racing, heists, and espionage.

title: Breaking Bad
details: Breaking Bad is a crime drama series about a high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturer.

title: Hannibal
details: Hannibal is a psychological horror-thriller series that explores the relationship between FBI agent Will Graham and Dr. Hannibal Lecter, a cannibalistic serial killer.

title: Friends
details: Friends is a popular sitcom that follows the personal and professional lives of six friends living in Manhattan.

title: Vox Machina
details: The Legend of Vox Machina is an animated series based on the Critical Role campaign, following a group of adventurers in a fantasy world.
